Key Match Events: Tanner Bibee couldn't hold back his tears
The Guardians left 47 runners on base
Hunter Gaddis allowed Juan Soto’s three-run homer in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Steven Kwan: 'It was a great year. Kind of hard to be able to look back right now. It’s still so fresh. It hurts pretty bad right now'

Stephen Vogt: 'Remember this feeling you have right now because there’s more left on the table for this group. We know we can accomplish more, but be proud of what we accomplished overall and use this to fuel your offseason'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' World Series title drought — going back to 1948 — got another year older
Others: All-Star left fielder Steven Kwan: 'They’re just a better team'
All-Star closer Emmanuel Clase regrouped in Game 5
All-Star David Fry hit a walk-homer in the 10th to win Game 3
